title: Españoles en el mundo
overview: A program that approaches destinations around the world through Spaniards who have decided to settle in another country. These ‘'new emigrants'' offer their particular point of view about the country that has welcomed them and explain their anecdotes about their lives there.Españoles en el mundo has become one of RTVE's longest-running programs. During more than 11 years of broadcasting and more than 300 programs, reporters and cameramen have visited more than 150 countries and more than 1000 cities, with nearly five million kilometers traveled.
